channel.title: Comments on: Wearing your own t-shirt is always frowned upon

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: it's just such a spinal tap-ian farce to do so.
item.content:encoded: it’s just such a spinal tap-ian farce to do so.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I bet we see more artists wearing their own shirts more often as a way to get their personal brand out there. (that sounds like I'm channeling Hipster Runoff, but I promise I'm not)
item.content:encoded: I bet we see more artists wearing their own shirts more often as a way to get their personal brand out there. (that sounds like I’m channeling Hipster Runoff, but I promise I’m not)
